Text: works good on the autocad 2012, just like the other kg's for 2011. dont forget to be offline and hit the patch button once your activation window is up.  thanks Chris

It appears that AC may have changed their method of activation.  It seems we are 7 numbers short of the correct activiation code and the method of getting there is different that described on the install instructions from Chris.

Also did not get "successfully patched" got error!
